question.questionText: Describe how the muscles in the front and back of the leg work together to make the dancer's foot point.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The muscle in the back of the leg (the gastrocnemius) contracts and the muscle in the front of the leg (the tibia) relaxes to make the foot point.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The muscles in the front the pulling.
